regions.name: header
regions.description:
Header of the drawer.

It should contain the only `h2` used in the drawer.

regions.name: headerActions
regions.description: Actions for the header. Available only if you specify the `header` property.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Adds the specified classes to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag: Custom CSS is not supported. For testing and other use cases, use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes).

properties.name: disableContentPaddings
properties.description: Determines whether the drawer content has padding. If `true`, removes the default padding from the content area.

properties.name: i18nStrings
properties.description: An object containing all the necessary localized strings required by the component.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Adds the specified ID to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag:
The usage of the `id` attribute is reserved for internal use cases. For testing and other use cases,
use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes). If you must
use the `id` attribute, consider setting it on a parent element instead.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Renders the drawer in a loading state. We recommend that you also set a `loadingText`.
